name: The Worm Game (Green Star Productions)
description:
A game made for Lame Jam 24. You play as a worm who collects the food orbs to grow bigger. But watch out for spiders, they'll eat you.

WASD to move. That's it.

Most of the art assets, save for a secret one, are made by me. Secret is made by M3ga.

OST is made by me. Full video to it here.
